title: League client randomly messes up
body: League client randomly does whats in the screen shot. Happens during champ select sometimes while browsing player information and at the end of games. When I clicked home at the end of game my game closed. This just started happening yesterday. Any ideas on how to fix?

replies.body: That's an interesting visual issue, and it could be due to either bad game files or an outdated video card.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide which will have some steps to fix this up.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for the repair portion, which will automatically bring you back to a fresh slate.  Hope that helps!
By out dated video card do you mean drivers? My card is a gtx 960
